channel.title: [562] Block Cheat Clients
channel.description:
hi i was just wondering how to block cheat clients from connecting to my server? i know the uid method but are there any other ways to defend from cheat clients?
also i was wondering on how to make a specific monster have attack delay. the monster hits like over and over again with no delay.

item.title: [562] Block Cheat Clients
item.dc:creator: @Dylan_100123 Dylan 100123
item.description:
@Dylan_100123 wrote:

[quote=“Prevision, post:3, topic:420453”]i could name like 2 or 3 cheat clients out there for 562.

ive already added a temporary fix for ‘follow to attack cheat’, and alching money dupe. they’ve also recently were able to attack my shop NPCs, making the NPCs follow them so my entire home was empty.[/quote]

mwh maby hit up google cuz than i have no cleu

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Block Cheat Clients
item.dc:creator: @Prevision Prevision
item.description:
@Prevision wrote:

i could name like 2 or 3 cheat clients out there for 562.

ive already added a temporary fix for ‘follow to attack cheat’, and alching money dupe. they’ve also recently were able to attack my shop NPCs, making the NPCs follow them so my entire home was empty.
